title.rendered: EC&M Ranks MYR Group at No. 3 on 2019 Top 50 Electrical Contractors List

content.rendered:
OCTOBER 3, 2019

EC&M RANKS MYR GROUP AT NO. 3 ON 2019 TOP 50 ELECTRICAL CONTRACTORS LIST

TWO SUBSIDIARIES – CSI ELECTRICAL CONTRACTORS AND L.E. MYERS – INCLUDED IN FEATURED STORY ON INDUSTRY RANKINGS, BASED ON 2018 REVENUE

MYR Group ranked #3 on the 2019 EC&M Top 50 Electrical Contractors list and two subsidiaries, CSI Electrical Contractors, Inc. (CSI Electrical Contractors) and The L.E. Myers Co. (L.E. Myers), were included in the featured story on the Top 50 at the EC&M website.

EC&M ranks contractors specifically by electrical revenue. MYR Group is included in a photo gallery on the EC&M Web site that offers a sneak peek at the companies making it into the Top 20 spots, listed in descending order based on 2018 electrical sales data. View the Top 20 Electrical Contractors photo gallery by clicking here.
